text: Vladimir Ilić (; born 24 February 1999) is a Serbian football defender who plays for FK Sinđelić Beograd in Serbian First League. ==Club career== After he spent his youth career with Intenacional Beograd, in summer 2018 he signed with Dinamo Vranje.Фудбал 29/18 at Football Association of Serbia, 18-7-2018 Ilić made his official debut for Dinamo Vranje in 1 fixture match of the 2018–19 Serbian SuperLiga season against Red Star. ==References== ==External links== * * * Profile at srbijafudbal.com Category:People from Sremska Mitrovica Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Dinamo Vranje players Category:FK Sinđelić Beograd players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Serbian First League players
title: Vladimir Ilić (footballer, born 1999)
